Detailed information about IJMB

What is IJMB?

IJMB simply means Interim Joint Matriculation Board. It is the body that moderates the popular IJMBE (Interim Joint Matriculation Board Examination) Interim Joint MatricuLation Board Examination is a Federal Government Educational Programme that was established, controlled and run by Amadu Bello University, Zaria(ABU). IJMBE is an advanced level educational Examination that qualifies its candidate for admission into 200Level any Nigeria and Foreign Universities through Direct Entry. Most candidate who failed either in JAMB or POST-UTME in the past always go through this program and majority of them gain admission into 200level and meet their colleagues in 200 level. The good news is that a lot of people are entering into the university via IJMB program directly into 200 level because of its relevance. IJMB will allow you to choose three courses/subjects that are related to what you want to study in the university of your choice. The programme last for nine (9) months divided into two semesters. During this period, students are exposed to intensive lectures from Mondays to Friday every week and a weekly Continuous Assessment..

IJMB IS CERTIFIED BY NUC

IJMB is certified by the NUC (Nigeria University Commission) as an advanced level programme for Direct-entry (DE) admission into universities in Nigeria. (See section 4.0 of JAMB Brochure for details).

IJMB IS EFFECTIVE & ECONOMICAL

IJMB is more economical to go for this programme because it will save you the cost and stress of 100 level as you will be admitted directly into 200 level upon completion of the programme. Even students with deficiency in O'level can still register for the programme because preparations have been made for them by IJMB where they can write O'level during the 9-months period to augment their result. Candidate with awaiting results can also register. IJMB fees can be paid gradually while studying for the programme.

IJMB IS APPROVED & MODERATED BY THE GOVERNMENT

IJMBE is a Federal government approved programme of 9 month and it is being moderated by the Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria, IJMB is designed to solve problems of admission for candidates seeking admission into Nigeria University instead of JAMB. IJMB examination is conducted in the first-quarter of every year, while the results is released in due time for admission processing. On completion of the programme, successful candidates can use their result to gain admission into 200 level in any Nigeria university through direct-entry into their chosen university. Most candidate who failed either in UTME or post-utme in the past always do this program and most of them get admission into 200level and meet their colleagues in 200 level. The good news is that a lot of people are entering into the university via lJMB program directly into 200 level because of its relevance.

IJMB CERTIFICATE is highly respected and recognized by various higher institutions(UNIVERSITIES) in Nigeria and abroad. The certificates/results are acceptable in increasing number of institutions in the country. The Federal Government, through its various educational agencies, recognize IJMB as an examining body for both Ordinary and Advanced Level Examinations. Click the link below to see a complete and newly updated list of both Federal, States and Private Universities that accept IJMB result for 200L admission
